alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Bighorn Mountains West; Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:47PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong Wind Gusts Near Showers and Thunderstorms This Evening... ...This is a special weather statement from the National Weather Service Office in Riverton.... * WHAT...Brief erratic wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. * WHERE...The Bighorn Basin and surrounding Absaroka and Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Through 8 PM MDT. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A line of showers and thunderstorms with strong outflow winds are moving from west to east across the Bighorn Basin this evening. Nearby storms in southern Montana have produced localized wind gusts in excess of 50 mph, and similar gusts are possible across northern Wyoming through this evening.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Bighorn Mountains West; Cody Foothills; North Big Horn Basin; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Southeast Big Horn Basin; Southwest Big Horn Basin
